thread.title: Ground News - Short-lived snowfall brings flurries, winter fun to parts of north Georgia
thread.title_full: Ground News - Short-lived snowfall brings flurries, winter fun to parts of north Georgia

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Short-lived snowfall brings flurries, winter fun to parts of north Georgia
text:
Summary by Ground News Some north Georgia residents still feel the holiday spirit thanks to light snowfall Friday. Jasper residents said the cold and frost were welcomed. Severe Weather Team 2 Meteorologist Jennifer Lopez said parts of north Georgia could see a dusting,with the highest elevations seeing up to a half inch. Share menu More
